user@localhost:~/test$ singularity prep create --source source --local-output '/tmp/TestDataPrepCreateHandler_WithStorage1411287986/001'

1   false              100      200        
    Wallets
        ID         Address         
        client_id  client_address  
    Source Storages:
        ID  Name    Type   Path         
        1   source  local  /tmp/source  
    Output Storages:
        ID  Name     Type   Path
